title: Language Design Project Based on an Online Design Studio

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational design principles and understanding of linguistic structures
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environment where students/job seekers solve real-world language design problems.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five-stage language design process: problem definition, idea sketching, prototyping, user testing, and iterative improvement
Learners can exchange real-time design feedback with team members using online collaboration tools
Learners can materialize language visual elements (typography, layout, color systems) according to project requirements
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
